{{< include macros.qmd >}}

Name | Symbol | Definition
:-------------- | ------ | ----------
Probability density function (PDF) | $\pdf(t)$ | $\p(T=t)$
Cumulative distribution function (CDF) |$\cdf(t)$ | $\P(T\leq t)$
Survival function | $\surv(t)$ | $\P(T > t)$
Hazard function | $\haz(t)$ | $\p(T=t|T\ge t)$
Cumulative hazard function | $\cuhaz(t)$ | $\int_{u=-\infty}^t \haz(u)du$
Log-hazard function | $\loghaz(t)$ | $\logf{\haz(t)}$

: Probability distribution functions {#tbl-prob-dist-fns}
